title: Project management
description: This project provides the foundation for my project administration and management. In version v2.0 the structure was redesigned compeletly to lower the administration overhead.

title: tiborsimon.io
description: The latest website implementation uses Pelican for static site generation with Bootstrap based custom theme hosted on GitHub Pages.

title: Solarized Gist
description: Give your embedded Gists Solarized theme. Full featured Gist with Solarized light or dark theme.

title: MATLAB Library System
description: The missing package handler for MATLAB. Activate, deactivate and share your projects easily. Installed projects will be globally visible.

title: Simple Input Parser
description: Function parameter parsing library with validation. More straightforward solution than MATLAB's built in one.

title: Smart Sinusoids
description: Sinusoid generator framework for MATLAB. Get the sinusoid wave you want, without worrying about the generation method.

title: Replaceit
description: Regular expression based file replacer tool that can handle multiple files.

title: Standardized workspace
description: Portable work environment. Collect your tools in one place. There is an option for one click initialization (registry, path...)

title: Java Shooter Game
description: Java Shooter Game is a simple open source Minigore-like game written in java.

title: Slotcar Race
description: Autopilot algorithm for small electric cars.

title: Learning Vim
description: Sublime sometimes is slow.. Time to change! I hate the mouse anyway :)
